questions.question: When a fluid is used in a Shell and Tube heat exchanger, which one of the following is not true?

answers.a: If the fluid is gas then the gas side heat transfer coefficient is the lowest
answers.b: Extended fins are used on the shell side to increase the Heat Transfer coefficient
answers.c: Baffles are provided only to work as fins
answers.d: Fins increase necessary heat transfer area
